title: WAMC News Podcast - Episode 338
dc:creator: WAMC Northeast Public Radio
description: We sit down with folk music host Wanda Fischer, who is marking 40 years of bringing WAMC listeners "The Hudson River Sampler" with a special tribute concert Saturday.
